movie.title: Fierce
movie.description_intro: Talent and passion for music can take one to the very top. On the way, however, there are going to be showbiz traps. There is money, fame and fan crowds involved. Will a young girl be able to fight for her dreams in this no-holds-barred world where fame is so elusive? A controversial talent show called "Music Race" keeps looking for talented singers all over the country. The decision on who will be started-up for a career and who will get a cold shower is always up to the three jurors: a once-popular singer, Olo (Maciej Zakoscielny), social media queen, Ewa (Julia Kaminska), and the dame of Polish jazz, Urszula Dudziak (playing herself). During an audition held in Olo's home town, there is a row. The person who starts it is "Ostra" (played by Katarzyna Sawczuk). The rebel teen is outraged by the juror's arrogant and dismissive behaviour towards her mother (Anita Sokolowska). The small scandal suits the show's producer (Tomasz Karolak), who pushes "Ostra" through to the next stage. ...

movies.title: Mr. Jones
movies.summary: A young couple moves to the woods and soon finds their nightmares and reality colliding.
movies.description_full: A young couple moves to the woods and soon finds their nightmares and reality colliding.
movies.synopsis: A young couple moves to the woods and soon finds their nightmares and reality colliding.

movies.title: Lil Ceaser
movies.summary: A wayward young man navigates the tough streets of Chicago and grows up to become one of the most feared and respected gangsters in the city.
movies.description_full: A wayward young man navigates the tough streets of Chicago and grows up to become one of the most feared and respected gangsters in the city.
movies.synopsis: A wayward young man navigates the tough streets of Chicago and grows up to become one of the most feared and respected gangsters in the city.

movies.title: Skyfall
movies.summary: When James Bond's (Daniel Craig's) latest assignment goes gravely wrong and Agents around the world are exposed, MI6 is attacked, forcing (M Dame Judi Dench) to relocate the agency. These events cause her authority and position to be challenged by Gareth Mallory (Ralph Fiennes), the new Chairman of the Intelligence and Security Committee. With MI6 now compromised from both inside and out, M is left with one ally she can trust: Bond. 007 takes to the shadows, aided only by field agent, Miss Eve Moneypenny (Naomie Harris), following a trail to the mysterious Tiago Rodriguez, a.k.a. Raoul Silva (Javier Bardem), whose lethal and hidden motives have yet to reveal themselves.

movies.title: Songbird
movies.summary: In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes.
movies.description_full: In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes.
